main_definition: Camcorders are electronic devices used to record videos, typically in a portable format.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A device for recording video and audio
meanings_and_examples.example: When John wanted to capture his daughter's birthday party, he used a camcorder.
The travel vloggers rely on their handheld camcorders to document their adventures around the world.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Devices with features like zoom, image stabilization, and various recording formats
meanings_and_examples.example: Mary purchased a new camcorder that came with advanced features such as 4K resolution and optical image stabilization to ensure her wedding videos would be of high quality.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A category or class within the broader field of video recording devices
meanings_and_examples.example: The tech store had an entire section dedicated to camcorders, showcasing various models from different manufacturers.
